Articles.Content:
True:

The user below me has gone to laythe

True (only with unmanned landers)

The user below me's favorite kerbal is not Jeb.

True, It's Geoffel Kerman...

The user below me is NOT a Brony.

What the heck is a brony?

The user below me hates school

False, I LOVE it

The user below me hasn't been in the great derp of 13

P.S. brony is a male who likes the show my little pony.

False, the kraken ate me, but I blew up its insides with an SRB (Jeb said so, when the kraken is involved, jebs word is the law)

The user below me was also eaten

Uhhh...no.

The user below me has a job with reasonable income.

False, I'm 14 and still in school,

The user below me does have a job

Indeed I do. I watch security footage all day.

The user below me has experimented with Jool's 'surface'

I was just thinking about doing that today when I got home from school,

"Jeb, get your anti kraken SRB cannon, your going into Jool"

The user below me has had the kraken break a space station apart at every single joint, making a massive debris belt (happened to me twice, in the same day

Nope, the kraen never atacked me.

The user below me made a giant self-sustaining Laythe base.
No, I've crashed on the moon before.The user below me enjoys recreating RL rocket launches with RL rocket mods.

False!

I enjoy playing with the stock parts(I have quite a few plugins,tough.)

I guess the user below me use mechjeb.

Correct!!!!!

But as it has many bugs and everytime it explodes my rocket, I'm not using it that much.

The user below me lived in the 60's.

False

The user below me frequently plays forum games.

TRUE!

How did you know?

The user below me has exploded a rocket...

True

The user below me has landed on Duna

True. bottle rockets!

The user below me had a toaster strudel for breakfast.

Ewwwwwwww

The user below me has launched Jeb into orbit on an SRB before

True...

The user below me will say the user below me...

False,

The user beneath me will be a brony

false

the user below me will hate me for not being a brony

False because im one doesn't mean i have to hate you bro.

user below me likes muffins ,and hates cupcakes due to certain reasons.

True

The user below me understands these certain reasons.

True, I never want to witness that again

The user below me is thinking that the bronies are taking over this thread...
